name: Intro to Java
review: A great introduction into coding. the class is relatively easy. I would look at this as like trying to learn a new language in a way.

name: Data Structures
review: Challenging, the projects here are big. this is the first step into having to spend time learning and updating code.

name: Computational Theory
description: Formal models of computation, ranging from finite state automata to Turing machines. Computational models are used to discuss the languages recognized by these machines and address issues of computability.
review: Following Discrete mathematics with this class is recommended.
